content.full_text:
From: Tonja Haddad Coleman 
Sent: 5/13/2013 10:28:30 PM 
To: Jeffrey Epstein [jeeyacation@gmail.com]; Darren Indyke 
;11111111111111111.1111111111111 _ 
; Debbie Fein 
Importance: High 
Farmer Jaffe is suing Donald Trump! 
http://www.mypalmbeachpost.cominews/businessilawsuit-lobbed-against-trumps-ownership-of-former-
/nXjjQ/?icmp=pbp_internallink_in6ationbox_apr2013_pbpstubtomypbp_launch 
Tonja Haddad Coleman, Esq. 
TONJA HADDAD, P.A. 
Advocate Building 
315 SE 7th Street 
Fort Lauderdale. FL 33301 
This e-mail contains PRIVILEGED AND CONFIDENTIAL information intended only for use of the addressee(s) named above. If you are not the intended recipient of this 
e-mail, or an authorized employee or agent responsible for delivering it to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination or copying of this e-
mail is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail in error, please notify us by reply e-mail and delete this e-mail from your records. Thank you for your 
cooperation. 
HOUSE OVERSIGHT 012898

events: Lawsuit by Farmer Jaffe against Donald Trump

notes: The document is a high-importance email from an attorney, Tonja Haddad Coleman, to Jeffrey Epstein and others, notifying them of a lawsuit against Donald Trump. A URL to a news article is included, but it appears to be broken or incomplete in the source text. A string of '1's appears in the 'To' field, which is likely a data corruption or redaction artifact. The document includes a standard legal confidentiality disclaimer and a Bates number indicating it is part of a House Oversight Committee production.
